page.title: 13SPRINGHEAD GOLF COURSE
page.content: Interview given by the secretary Mr Cosgrave to Darren Walker and Darren Bilton June 1985 at the Golf Club. The Golf Club first opened on June 2nd 1930 after an inaugaral meeting at Hull's Guildhall.The club is a private club which uses the facilities provided by the council ,who maintain the greens.The course is 6.500 yards long. There are 400 members including 55 pensioners,25 ladies and 17 juniors. The jioning fee is Â£25 and the annual subscription is Â£20 for seniors.A round of golf costs Â£3 and the course itself is open all the year round from dawn till dusk. The golf course was originally a large farm and the club house was the farm - house which has been beautifully converted.A {GHOST,}Annie is supposed to haunt the attics!
